scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Contains two quartermaster receipts and two requisition forms issued by the Confederate Army in 1864 and involving M. B. Tate. Also includes a statement about the death of a CSA horse and two letters to Mr. Tate written after the war.
